title: YouTube will show a video’s most replayed parts and is testing faster seeking
content:
YouTube is announcing a handful of updates today to its video player from a “Most replayed” graph to testing ways to quickly jump to sections you’d be more interested in.

more…

The post YouTube will show a video’s most replayed parts and is testing faster seeking appeared first on 9to5Google.
